title: International Women's Day 2017 panel discussion - Cardno Sydney
author: WORK180
body:
To mark International Women's Day on 8 March 2017, Cardno's Sydney office held a breakfast and panel discussion on gender equality and making bold change

The panel comprised Valeria Ignatieva, Director of DCC Jobs, Stephen Oxley, Business Unit Manager - Transport, Cardno APAC South and Sarah Hesse, Business Unit Manager - Water & Environment, Cardno APAC South. The discussion was moderated by Tiana Jarvis, Civil Drafter, Cardno.


 

About DCC Jobs

DCC Jobs is a jobs board with a difference! We pre-screen employers on paid parental leave, pay equity, flexible working arrangements and much more. This information is not publicly listed elsewhere and is an essential tool in your job search when assessing employers.
